channel.title: Personals on Opinionated Guides
channel.description: Recent content in Personals on Opinionated Guides

item.description: Wishlist # $50 and Under # Name & Link Description Picture Category Price in USD (approx) Geiger Counter Detects Radiation Electronics ~$40 Musical Tesla Coil Makes music with big sparks in the air Music / Electronics ~$30 Magic Eye Tube Music Display using a tube Music / Electronics ~$25 Small Electric Screwdriver(Arturia) Saves my hands hurting when tearing apart big things Electronics ~$32 Toki Pona: The Language of Good Book about how to speak and write in a neat fantasy language Book ~$16 Morse Code Straight Key I'd actually be using this as part of a DIY guitar pedal Electronics ~$25 Nerdy Shirt Either a medium or large should fit Clothes ~$23 Safety Valve Eurorack Module PCB Distortion Effect Music ~$50 $50 to $100 # Name & Link Description Picture Category Price in USD (approx) ZLOB Diode Chaos Makes nice random signals for music stuff Electronics ~$90IF YOU CAN GET IT USED, DO $100+ # Name & Link Description Picture Category Price in USD (approx) Stero MICROPHONE THESE ARE NOT HEADPHONES Allows for recording in stereo Music ~$150 MIDI HUb Allows complex routing of my other equipment in really fun ways Music ~$180 Data Bender Glitchy, broken super fun sounding audio effect Music ~$350IF YOU CAN GET IT USED, DO Cursus Iteritas Audio sound source, probably the best sounding out there for what it does Music ~$360IF YOU CAN GET IT USED, DO
